Text: Officials will be conducting random bag and locker checks at all schools in North Slope Borough starting Tuesday Troopers identified the person who died as 46-year-old Elmer Brown Sr. Temperatures in Kotzebue are already in the low teens and 20s this week, making repairs more challenging.
